  • Method Details

    • Create

      public static Rotor Create(String name, int rotorPosition, int ringSetting)
      creates different rotor object with the provided settings.
      Parameters:
      name - name of rotor to use.
      rotorPosition - position of rotor .
      ringSetting - ring setting of rotor.
      Returns:
      the built Rotor object.

      public int forward(int c)
      Get the enciphered character for a given character (int form)
      Parameters:
      c - character to encipher in the forward direction
      Returns:
      enciphered character

    • backward

      public int backward(int c)
      Virtually the same as forward(int c) but named backward to help read the code when the character has been reflected and is being enciphered backwards through the rotors
      Parameters:
      c - character to encipher in the forward direction
      Returns:
      enciphered character

    • isAtNotch

      public boolean isAtNotch()
      Check if rotor is at a notch position
      Returns:
      boolean

    • turnover

      public void turnover()
      Turn over rotor (if at 25 and turns over, resets back to 0)
